posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 Cobb Portrait Green PSA 3

posts.post_content: Beautiful card and welcome to the board! Good luck with the sale!
That's a big hitter right off the bat. Good luck!

[quote name="varska" post=1613275]I have a Ty Cobb with a Piedmont back for sale for $3845. I'm a new member and this is my first post, so if you need add'l pics, verification, eBay feedback etc. just let me know. This would be a Paypal transaction and includes insured shipping. Thanks - Jim

[IMG]https://us.v-cdn.net/6027503/uploads/editor/6j/2dabeg1s00f0.jpg[/IMG][/QUOTE]



Fantastic card! Crazy low grade IMHO. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Thanks all - I kind of agree that the grade seems low. Looking at other 3's I see a lot more issues. Oh well, I guess everyone thinks their kids are the best-looking
Very nice 3! Wish it were a 4 as that is what I am in search of for my set. Happy holidays and good luck with the sale.
PM Sent through Facebook messenger, Bill
